Title: Hostile Takeover
Plot: A mercurial Las Vegas casino czar ups the ante on a business deal with a frustrated Marty; and Clyde's club-owner friends look to him to expand their brand beyond Vegas. Meanwhile, Marty picks up some inside dirt on Tamara.
Writer: Theo Travers, Wesley S. Nickerson III
GuestStars: Adam Brody, Nia Long, Jenny Slate, Kevin Dobson, Mather Zickel, Evan Hart, Taylor Gerard Hart
